page.title: 10SUPERNATURAL
page.content: THERE IS SUPPOSED TO BE A GHOST IN OUR SCHOOL IN THE STAFF ROOM.PEOPLE SAY HE GOT SACKED AND HE HAS AN OLD TEACHERS CAP ON.AND A BLACK CLOAK AND HE COMES OUT THE PINK DOOR NEXT TO THE PHOTO COPIER.AND SOMETIMES WE HEAR TAPPING ON THE STAIR CASE NO ONE KNOWS IF HE EXISTS.THERE ARE 14 PEOPLE WHO BELIVES IN IT AND 7 PEOPLE DON'T.THE THONHILL SOCIAL CLUB HAS A GHOST.AND IT WAS BIULT UPON A GRAVEYARD AND ONLY 4 PEOPLE HAVE SEEN IT THEY ARE MRS.PEARSON AND MRS.MOORFOOT AND MY MAM ANN BRANNIGAN I ALSO HAVE SEEN IT. IN OUR CLASS 15 PEOPLE BELIEVE IN GHOSTS AND 6 DON'T.THERE IS NO EVIDENCE TO PROVE THE EXISTENCE OF WITCHES AND WIZARDS IN THIS AREA
